name: Algorithm
desc: Hashing algorithm used to generate one time password codes

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: OTP
desc: RFC4226/RFC6238 One-Time Password / Google Authenticator Library

name: constantTimeVerification
desc: Allows you to compare 2 codes in constant time, to mitigate timing attacks for secure codes.

name: generateHOTPCode
desc: Generates a one time password code based on a counter you provide and increment.

name: generateHOTPCodeString
desc: Generates a one time password code based on a counter you provide and increment, returns as a 0 padded string.

name: generateTOTPCode
desc: Generates a Time-based one time password code

name: generateTOTPCodeString
desc: Generates a Time-based one time password code and return as a 0 padded string.

name: getAlgorithm
desc: Gets the Mac for the provided algorithm. Mostly used for testing, not very helpful outside of that.

name: getInternalDigest
desc:
Mostly used for testing purposes, but this can get you the internal digest based on your settings.
No handholding for this function, so you need to know exactly what to pass in.

name: lastUsedCounter
desc: Has the last used counter for HOTP and TOTP codes. TOTP codes are Milliseconds / 1000 / interval (default 30)

name: lastUsedTime
desc: Has the last used timestamp for TOTP codes, should match what you passed into the functions last.

name: randomSecret
desc: Generates a cryptographically secure random secret in base32 string format.

name: remainingSeconds
desc:
There is a method that will tell you how much time remains in the current time step window in seconds.
Interval is your TOTP function interval value (default = 30)

name: useTOTPPaddingForHOTP
desc: Used to enable TOTP style padding of the secret for SHA256 and SHA512 usage with HOTP. False by default.
